about.title: About CanvaPro365Free
about.subtitle: We are a platform for sharing free Canva Pro and Canva Education team join links, built by the community and for the community.

features.safeDesc: All links are verified and protected from spam to ensure the best experience.
features.fastDesc: Just a few simple steps and you can join a Canva Pro team instantly.
features.communityDesc: Thousands of users trust and use our service every day.
features.globalDesc: Supporting 7 different languages to serve users worldwide.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We believe everyone deserves access to professional design tools. CanvaPro365Free was created to help people experience Canva Pro for free in a safe and easy way.
mission.point1: Sharing links from the community transparently and safely
mission.point2: Protecting links from spam to maximize the number of beneficiaries
mission.point3: Providing the best user experience with a friendly interface

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Browse through available links and choose one that fits your needs.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Complete the countdown and verification to unlock the link.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Click join and you will be redirected to Canva to complete.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We are committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when using CanvaPro365Free.

collection.title: Information Collection
collection.content: We only collect technical information necessary to operate the service, including IP addresses, browser information, and usage data. We do not request personal information such as name, email, or phone number from regular users.

usage.title: Information Usage
usage.content: Collected information is only used to: prevent spam and abuse, improve service quality, analyze traffic, and ensure system security.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We apply industry-standard security measures to protect your information. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to request access, modification, or deletion of data related to you. Contact us via email to exercise these rights.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us via the email provided in the support section.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using CanvaPro365Free, you agree to comply with the following terms. Please read carefully before using the service.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using this website, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to comply with these terms of use and all applicable laws and regulations.

service.title: Service Description
service.content: CanvaPro365Free provides a platform for sharing Canva Pro and Canva Education team join links from the community. We are not affiliated with Canva Inc. and do not guarantee the availability of links.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Activities
prohibited.content: It is prohibited to use bots or automated scripts, abuse the system by creating multiple sessions, attempt to bypass protective measures, or use the service for commercial purposes.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The service is provided "as is" without any warranty. We are not responsible for the availability, accuracy, or quality of shared links.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: In no event shall CanvaPro365Free be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use of the service.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the service after changes are made constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about CanvaPro365Free
faq.a1: CanvaPro365Free is a platform for sharing team join links for Canva Pro and Canva Education for free. We aggregate links from the community and protect them from spam to ensure the best experience for real users.
faq.q2: How do I join a Canva Pro team?
faq.a2: It's simple! Choose an available link on the homepage, wait for the countdown to complete, finish verification (if any), then click the join button. You'll be redirected to Canva to complete the process.
faq.q3: Why do I need to wait for the countdown?
faq.a3: The countdown system helps prevent bots and spam, ensuring that remaining slots are reserved for real users. This helps links last longer and benefits more people.
faq.a4: Yes, all links are verified before posting. We don't store your personal information and don't ask for any sensitive data.
faq.a5: We currently don't have a public link contribution feature. If you'd like to share links, please contact admin through our support channels.
